long_description: The Hurtta Free Hand leash incorporates a comfortable and practical handgrip and thumb hole, freeing your hand to use your mobile phone, hold a water bottle or push a stroller. Soft neoprene handle fits comfortably against your skin and offers pull-absorbing stretch; thumb-hole design helps keep the handle secured to your hand. Sturdy and durable nylon webbing stands up to strong, pulling dogs and extends from 3 to 5 ft. The Hurtta Free Hand leash features 3M reflective accents for enhanced visibility in low light.
short_description: The Hurtta Free Hand leash incorporates a comfortable and practical handgrip and thumb hole, freeing your hand to use your mobile phone, hold a water bottle or push a stroller.
